name: Japanese Relief Shirt v2 Gray
description:
Now featuring the v2 design in gray!

The world has never seen such acts of human selflessness displayed by the Japanese firefighters as they plummet into what many scientists call “a suicide mission”. Ceaselessly, these men fight day and night in lethal radiation. Their efforts to stabilize the damaged reactors were not in vain. Amazingly they slowed the lethal spread of radiation that would have affected millions.
The battle is won, but the war still rages on.
There are still thousands who are in need of medical aid. Help fight one of the world’s worst natural disasters with KR Krew

Pre-order a shirt!
All profit will go to the American Red Cross
